extensionAttribute.displayName: Bootstrap Token Escrow Status EA Full Output
extensionAttribute.description:
Extension attribute to report inventory information about whether or not a macOS Catalina+ device has been Bootstrapped. https://travellingtechguy.blog/jamf-pro-extension-attribute-bootstrap/
jfilice@csumb.edu: Modified 2022/12/14
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/bash # very simple Extension Attribute to collect Bootstrap information # copy script to an EA in Jamf Pro Settings -> Computer -> Extension Attribute # EA input type: script # 28th of January 2020 - By Travelling Tech Guy # https://travellingtechguy.blog bootstrap=$(profiles status -type bootstraptoken) echo "<result>$bootstrap</result>"
